name: Nanzheng Xie
title: Applied AI Engineer (CISSP, CRISC)
profile: Applied Al engineer (CISSP, CRISC) with 6+ years' experience leading cross-functional teams to deliver Al- and security-driven products. I led product strategy, delivered digital-transformation outcomes, and strengthened risk-aware decision-making across internal teams and global stakeholders.

experience.title: Senior Consultant – Al & Cybersecurity
experience.description: Built and productionized large-scale Insider-Threat ML platform, developed a “Phishing Response Plugin”, and built an executive-facing Water Sector Readiness Dashboard. Led the design of Security Operations Centre tech stack.

experience.title: Cybersecurity Consultant
experience.description: Contributed as an industry stakeholder in developing research methodologies to integrate cybersecurity into engineering practices for Critical Infrastructure. Delivered training on the CIE framework.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: Developed In-house algorithm using RFC and Time Series Modeling in production PLCs, resulting in annual savings of $750,000 in Wastewater Critical Infrastructure.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Development of intelligent cabin filter, utilizing RGB light sensors to predict filter condition (aging) using machine learning.

experience.title: Quantitative Risk Analyst
experience.description: Conducted financial risk analysis of downtime. Analyse and provided strategy guidance to reduce risk impact and asset re-balancing in two largest NIKE manufacturing plants.
